newsitem.title: USA: Biospherics signs D-tagatose license pact.
newsitem.headline: Biospherics signs D-tagatose license pact.

text.p: Biospherics Inc said Wednesday that it has signed a licensing and commercialization agreement for its patented low-calorie sweetener with a division of Denmark's MD Foods.

The agreement for D-tagatose, a natural sugar, was for an undisclosed amount and completes a letter of intent signed in 1995 under which MD Foods constructed a pilot plant to make the product, the company said.
Biospherics said the agreement gives it running royalties on all D-tagatose sales. The company said it is seeking approval to market D-tagatose in the United States and Europe.
